name: GTM SPA Injection Tag Template
description: For use as a Custom HTML tag type with a Page View trigger
code:
<script>
(function() {
    /**
     * 1. THE TASK FUNCTION
     * This is where you put the "Hello World" logic.
     */
    var runProjectLogic = function(targetElement) {
        // Safety: Ensure we don't initialize the same element twice
        if (targetElement.dataset.initialized === "true") return;
        
        // Mark as initialized
        targetElement.dataset.initialized = "true";

        // --- HELLO WORLD LOGIC ---
        console.log("Hello World: SPA component detected and logic applied!");
        targetElement.style.border = "2px solid #018bc0"; 
        // -------------------------
    };

    /**
     * 2. THE OBSERVER
     * This watches for the specific 'wrapper' class to enter the DOM.
     */
    var observer = new MutationObserver(function(mutations) {
        // Replace '.azb-shell' with whatever unique class your CMS uses
        var shell = document.querySelector('.azb-shell');
        
        if (shell) {
            runProjectLogic(shell);
        }
    });

    /**
     * 3. START WATCHING
     * We watch the 'body' because in SPAs, the body stays while 
     * the internal HTML is swapped out.
     */
    observer.observe(document.body, { 
        childList: true, 
        subtree: true 
    });

    // Run once immediately for direct entry (hard refresh)
    var initialCheck = document.querySelector('.azb-shell');
    if (initialCheck) runProjectLogic(initialCheck);
    
})();
</script>

name: Content Slider Hero - TV
code:
<style>
        /* Basic Reset */
        * {
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            box-sizing: border-box;
        }

        /* Carousel Wrapper */
        .carousel-wrapper {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            position: relative;
            /*width: 80%;*/
            margin: -40px auto 0px auto;
        }

        /* Carousel Container */
        .carousel {
            overflow: hidden;
            width: 100%;
            touch-action: pan-y; /* Allow vertical scrolling */
        }

        /* Slides Wrapper */
        .slides {
            display: flex;
            transition: transform 0.5s ease-in-out;
            will-change: transform;
        }

        /* Individual Slide */
        .slide {
            width: 1284px;
            flex-shrink: 0;
            /* Customize slide content */
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            /* Removed background-color */
            padding: 40px;
        }

        /* Navigation Arrows */
        .nav {
            background: none; /* Removed background-color */
            border: none;
            padding: 15px;
            cursor: pointer;
            /* Adjusted for SVG icons */
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
          position:relative;
        }

        .nav.prev {
            margin-right: 10px;
          position:absolute;
          left:-50px;
          margin-left:-10px;
        }

        .nav.next {
           margin-left: 10px;
    position: absolute;
    right: -50px;
    margin-right: -10px;
        }

        /* Adjust arrow icon size */
        .nav svg {
            width: auto;
            height: 34px;
            fill: #000; /* Adjust the color of the SVG arrows */
        }

        /* Dot Indicators */
        .dots {
            text-align: center;
            padding: 15px;
            /* Removed background-color */
            margin-top: 10px;
        }

        .dot {
            display: inline-block;
            width: 15px;
            height: 15px;
            margin: 5px;
            background-color: #bbb;
            border-radius: 50%;
            cursor: pointer;
        }

        .dot.active {
            background-color: #717171;
        }

        /* Responsive Adjustments */
        @media (max-width: 600px) {
            .nav {
                padding: 10px;
            }
            .nav svg {
                width: 20px;
                height: 20px;
            }
        }
    </style>
<script>
(function() {
    // Function to initialize the carousel
    function initCarousel() {
        console.log('Initializing carousel without cloning slides...');
 
        // Select required elements
        var slidesContainer = document.querySelector('.slides');
        var slides = document.querySelectorAll('.slide');
        var prevButton = document.querySelector('.nav.prev');
        var nextButton = document.querySelector('.nav.next');
        var dotsContainer = document.querySelector('.dots');
 
        // Check if required elements are present
        if (!slidesContainer || slides.length === 0 || !prevButton || !nextButton || !dotsContainer) {
            console.error('Carousel initialization failed: Required elements are missing.');
            return;
        }
 
        console.log('Required elements found.');
        console.log('Number of slides:', slides.length);
 
        var totalSlides = slides.length;
        var index = 0; // Start from the first slide
        var startX = 0;
        var isDragging = false;
        var animationDuration = 500; // Duration in milliseconds
        var slideWidth = 0; // Variable to store the width of each slide
 
        // Function to calculate and set the width of each slide dynamically
        var calculateSlideWidth = function() {
            slideWidth = slides[0].clientWidth; // Get the width of the first slide (assuming all slides are the same width)
            console.log('Calculated slide width:', slideWidth);
            // Update the slidesContainer transform to the correct position
            var translateValue = index * slideWidth;
slidesContainer.style.transform = 'translateX(-' + translateValue + 'px)';
        };
 
        // Call calculateSlideWidth to initialize slide width
        calculateSlideWidth();
 
        // Event listeners for window resize to recalculate slide width
        window.addEventListener('resize', calculateSlideWidth);
 
        // Function to update the slide position with the dynamically calculated width
        var goToSlide = function(n) {
            // Handle infinite loop logic without cloning
            if (n < 0) {
                index = totalSlides - 1;
            } else if (n >= totalSlides) {
                index = 0;
            } else {
                index = n;
            }
slidesContainer.style.transition = 'transform ' + animationDuration + 'ms ease-in-out';
            var translateValue = index * slideWidth;
slidesContainer.style.transform = 'translateX(-' + translateValue + 'px)';
            updateDots();
        };
 
        // Update dot indicators
        var updateDots = function() {
            var dots = document.querySelectorAll('.dot');
            for (var i = 0; i < dots.length; i++) {
                dots[i].classList.remove('active');
            }
            dots[index].classList.add('active');
            console.log('Updated active dot to:', index);
        };
 
        // Event listeners for navigation
        nextButton.addEventListener('click', function() {
            console.log('Next button clicked.');
            goToSlide(index + 1);
        });
 
        prevButton.addEventListener('click', function() {
            console.log('Previous button clicked.');
            goToSlide(index - 1);
        });
 
        // Touch support
        var addTouchSupport = function() {
            console.log('Adding touch support.');
 
            slidesContainer.addEventListener('touchstart', touchStartHandler, {passive: true});
            slidesContainer.addEventListener('touchmove', touchMoveHandler, {passive: false});
            slidesContainer.addEventListener('touchend', touchEndHandler);
        };
 
        var touchStartHandler = function(e) {
            console.log('Touch start.');
 
            startX = e.touches[0].clientX;
            isDragging = true;
slidesContainer.style.transition = 'none';
        };
 
        var touchMoveHandler = function(e) {
            if (!isDragging) return;
            e.preventDefault(); // Prevent scrolling
            var currentX = e.touches[0].clientX;
            var diff = startX - currentX;
            var translateValue = (index * slideWidth) + diff;
slidesContainer.style.transform = 'translateX(-' + translateValue + 'px)';
        };
 
        var touchEndHandler = function(e) {
            console.log('Touch end.');
 
            isDragging = false;
            var endX = e.changedTouches[0].clientX;
            var diff = startX - endX;
            if (Math.abs(diff) > 50) {
                if (diff > 0) {
                    goToSlide(index + 1);
                } else {
                    goToSlide(index - 1);
                }
            } else {
slidesContainer.style.transition = 'transform ' + animationDuration + 'ms ease-in-out';
                var translateValue = index * slideWidth;
slidesContainer.style.transform = 'translateX(-' + translateValue + 'px)';
            }
        };
 
        // Initialize slider
        var initSlider = function() {
            console.log('Initializing slider...');
 
            // Create dot indicators
            for (var i = 0; i < totalSlides; i++) {
                var dot = document.createElement('span');
                dot.classList.add('dot');
                if (i === index) dot.classList.add('active');
 
                // Closure to capture the current value of i
                (function(i) {
                    dot.addEventListener('click', function() {
                        console.log('Dot clicked:', i);
                        goToSlide(i);
                    });
                })(i);
 
                dotsContainer.appendChild(dot);
            }
 
            console.log('Dots created:', totalSlides);
 
            addTouchSupport();
 
            // Position slides container to the correct starting position
            var translateValue = index * slideWidth;
slidesContainer.style.transform = 'translateX(-' + translateValue + 'px)';
        };
 
        // Initialize the slider
        initSlider();
    }
 
    // Function to wait until the required elements are present
    function waitForElements() {
        var checkInterval = setInterval(function() {
            var slidesContainer = document.querySelector('.slides');
            var slides = document.querySelectorAll('.slide');
            var prevButton = document.querySelector('.nav.prev');
            var nextButton = document.querySelector('.nav.next');
            var dotsContainer = document.querySelector('.dots');
 
            if (slidesContainer && slides.length > 0 && prevButton && nextButton && dotsContainer) {
                console.log('All required elements are present.');
                clearInterval(checkInterval);
                initCarousel();
            } else {
                console.log('Waiting for elements to be available...');
            }
        }, 100); // Check every 100 milliseconds
    }
 
    // Start waiting for elements
    waitForElements();
})();
</script>

name: AZ Blue In Action - Ceros Truck
code:
<script>
(function() {
  function injectEmbed(target) {
    if (!target || target.getAttribute('data-ceros-loaded')) return;

    // Create wrapper div
    var embedWrapper = document.createElement('div');
    embedWrapper.setAttribute('style', 'position: relative;width: auto;padding: 0 0 36.56%;height: 0;top: 0;left: 0;bottom: 0;right: 0;margin: 0;border: 0 none');
    embedWrapper.setAttribute('id', 'experience-67d494d229058');
    embedWrapper.setAttribute('data-aspectRatio', '2.73504274');
    embedWrapper.setAttribute('data-tablet-aspectRatio', '0.74963397');
    embedWrapper.setAttribute('data-mobile-aspectRatio', '0.5625879');

    // Create iframe
    var iframe = document.createElement('iframe');
    iframe.setAttribute('allowfullscreen', '');
    iframe.setAttribute('src', 'https://view.ceros.com/az-blue/hero');
    iframe.setAttribute('style', 'position: absolute;top: 0;left: 0;bottom: 0;right: 0;margin: 0;padding: 0;border: 0 none;height: 1px;width: 1px;min-height: 100%;min-width: 100%');
    iframe.setAttribute('frameborder', '0');
    iframe.setAttribute('class', 'ceros-experience');
    iframe.setAttribute('title', 'Hero');
    iframe.setAttribute('scrolling', 'no');

    embedWrapper.appendChild(iframe);
    target.appendChild(embedWrapper);

    var script = document.createElement('script');
    script.setAttribute('type', 'text/javascript');
    script.setAttribute('src', 'https://view.ceros.com/scroll-proxy.min.js');
    script.setAttribute('data-ceros-origin-domains', 'view.ceros.com');
    document.body.appendChild(script);

    target.setAttribute('data-ceros-loaded', 'true');
  }

  function isInViewport(el) {
    var rect = el.getBoundingClientRect();
    return (
      rect.top <= (window.innerHeight || document.documentElement.clientHeight) &&
      rect.bottom >= 0
    );
  }

  function setupObserver(target) {
    if ('IntersectionObserver' in window) {
      var observer = new IntersectionObserver(function(entries, obs) {
        entries.forEach(function(entry) {
          if (entry.isIntersecting) {
            injectEmbed(entry.target);
            obs.unobserve(entry.target);
          }
        });
      }, { threshold: 0.1 });
      observer.observe(target);
    } else {
      // Fallback for older browsers
      var checkScroll = function() {
        if (isInViewport(target)) {
          injectEmbed(target);
          window.removeEventListener('scroll', checkScroll);
          window.removeEventListener('resize', checkScroll);
        }
      };
      window.addEventListener('scroll', checkScroll);
      window.addEventListener('resize', checkScroll);
      checkScroll(); // Initial check
    }
  }

  try {
    var targetDiv = document.querySelector('.cerosGTM');
    if (targetDiv) {
      setupObserver(targetDiv);
    }
  } catch (e) {
    console.error('Ceros embed lazy load failed:', e);
  }
})();
</script>
<!-- Script Version ID: CerosEmbed_Lazy_v1_20250711 -->

name: AZ Blue In Action - Image Rotator
AZ Blue In Action - Flip Cards
code:
<style>
/* Card container */
#c53dfa18-bef9-4faf-90bd-de466fe1182e > div > div ul li {
  height: 400px !important;
  position: relative;
  display: block;
}

#c53dfa18-bef9-4faf-90bd-de466fe1182e > div > div ul li > div {
  position: relative;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  cursor: pointer;
}

/* Card sides base styles */
.card-side {
  position: absolute;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  transition: opacity 0.6s;
}

/* Front of card */
.card-front {
  opacity: 1;
  z-index: 2;
}

/* Back of card */
.card-back {
  opacity: 0;
  z-index: 1;
  background: white;
  padding: 2rem;
}

/* States when flipped */
.flipped .card-front {
  opacity: 0;
  z-index: 1;
}

.flipped .card-back {
  opacity: 1;
  z-index: 2;
}
</style>

<script>
(function() {
  // Get all card containers
  var cards = document.querySelectorAll('#c53dfa18-bef9-4faf-90bd-de466fe1182e > div > div ul li > div');
  
  // Function to unflip all cards
  function unflipAllCards() {
    cards.forEach(function(card) {
      card.classList.remove('flipped');
    });
  }
  
  // Function to handle click events
  function handleClick(event) {
    var clickedCard = event.currentTarget;
    
    if (clickedCard.classList.contains('flipped')) {
      // If clicking an already flipped card, just unflip it
      clickedCard.classList.remove('flipped');
    } else {
      // If clicking a new card, unflip all others and flip this one
      unflipAllCards();
      clickedCard.classList.add('flipped');
    }
  }
  
  // Initialize cards
  cards.forEach(function(card) {
    // Add card side classes
    card.querySelector('div:first-child').classList.add('card-side', 'card-front');
    card.querySelector('div:nth-child(2)').classList.add('card-side', 'card-back');
    
    // Find and remove the height class
    var elementsWithHeight = card.getElementsByClassName('h-[270px]');
    if (elementsWithHeight.length > 0) {
      Array.from(elementsWithHeight).forEach(function(element) {
        element.classList.remove('h-[270px]');
      });
    }
    
    // Add click handler
    card.addEventListener('click', handleClick);
    
    // Add accessibility attributes
    card.setAttribute('tabindex', '0');
    card.setAttribute('role', 'button');
    card.setAttribute('aria-label', 'Flip card to see details');
    
    // Add keyboard support
    card.addEventListener('keydown', function(event) {
      if (event.key === 'Enter' || event.key === ' ') {
        event.preventDefault();
        handleClick({ currentTarget: card });
      }
    });
  });
})();
</script>
